name: Don-t-lose-your-query
body:
## About
![Image](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/JRztTn8aXtr29gQUx2sxkSZq4dQjUGLMd6cZ26Wp0tPogeanJjncGlhrLzNHuZnbkq1P6n_SaVw=s128-h128-e365)
This tiny (less than 200KB) Chrome Extension and Firefox Addon saves your queries while working on phpminiadmin/phpmyadmin in localStorage so that you never lose your queries across sessions. It stores the queries in localStorage and displays them on the page.

##Download
####[For Chrome](http://devilsworkshop.org/files/2012/01/Chrome_new_logo.png) 
![Chrome](http://asset1.cbsistatic.com/cnwk.1d/i/tim/2011/11/25/Chrome-logo-large_120x96.jpg)

#OR

####[For Firefox](http://cdn1.1stwebdesigner.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/02/logo-design-tutorials/firefox-logo-design-tutorial.jpg) 
![Firefox](http://dailywebthing.com/linkport/images/firefox-logo_small.png)

###Test it out [here](http://demo.galaxywebservices.com/steveshaw/phpminiadmin.php)

#Snapshots
##Recent tab to display last few queries
![Demo](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/qvtOEPAU8Tt8bpZA9jLAfGBe3BnNdxIFWAibtBZp-z4M9d40dqABOwv4n3lbND209xdMFnVg=s400-h275-e365)

##Turns query area into an autocomplete
![Demo](https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/ugsz3j5byXDLxsCBAhq1DOAqpNCPkC8J4m-L7v8V5TWvrdIw8sTdGl9gbc83d0GpA8_RZ8bJ=s400-h275-e365)
tagline: Don't Lose Your Queries while working on phpminiadmin.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
